interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Jurassic Park Collection (Jurassic Park / The Lost World: Jurassic Park / Jurassic Park III / Jurassic World) Review Date: 2018/06/22 Store: Jeff Goldblum (Actor), Chris Pratt (Actor), Colin Trevorrow (Director, Writer), Joe Johnston (Director) & 1 more Rated: PG-13 Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Steven Spielberg returns to executive produce the long-awaited next installment of his groundbreaking Jurassic Park series, Jurassic World, an epic action-adventure.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '2.20:1, 2:1, 1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.75 x 1 inches; 11.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35222591', 'Director': 'Colin Trevorrow, Joe Johnston, Steven Spielberg', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Color, Widescreen, Blu-ray, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '12 hours and 6 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 20, 2015', 'Actors': 'Jeff Goldblum, Chris Pratt, Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Bryce Dallas Howard', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Frank Marshall, Steven Spielberg, Patrick Crowley, Larry Franco, Kathleen Kennedy', 'Language': 'English (DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD 2.0), French (DTS 5.1), French Canadian (DTS 5.1), Spanish (DTS 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver, Peter Buchman, Derek Connolly, Colin Trevorrow', 'Number of discs': '6'} Review Text: We have had this set for a while now and it's great! I'm sorry, I'm not a person that knows all the tech details but from my perspective it's
the picture quality, value and the nerd factor of having the collection🤓🐊 Review Title: from my perspective it's the picture quality, value and the nerd factor Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
The user demonstrates a clear preference for engaging and educational content suitable for young children, particularly valuing shows that incorporate elements of music and learning, especially in areas like math and patterns. This focus on educational value is underscored by their child's developing interest in math, whereas the user consistently appreciates family-friendly content with fun and catchy songs that captivate young audiences. Their high ratings (4.7 and 5.0) reflect a positive reception of quality programming in this genre.

Recently, the user expanded their viewing interests to include more adult-oriented entertainment, specifically favoring titles with exceptional picture quality and a strong intellectual appeal, as indicated by their enthusiastic review of a popular film collection. This shift suggests an openness to diverse content that balances both entertainment and personal interests, which may also foster family discussions. Overall, the user values programming that is entertaining, educational, and provides enjoyable experiences for both parents and children, while now also appreciating high-quality productions that cater to their broader entertainment tastes.
